title: Yasuo's windwall blocks Lulu polymorph?
body:
In a recent game I tried to polymorph Yasuo through his windwall and my ability just went on cooldown. I'm guess its because her polymorph is an invisible projectile? 

Yasuo's windwall should be nerfed so that fight changing abilities aren't completely ignored. For example ultimates, *cough* Nami *cough* or abilities like Lulu's W were it literally turns a hated assassin into a squirrel.

-This is coming from a Yasuo main so its not just another person on the bandwagon of Yasuo hate.

replies.body:
If you watch the animation, it is a projectile. 

And there's no way to code "fight changing projectile". Every projectile has the potential for that.
It would actually be extremely easy to code massive projectiles to ignore wind wall. Some of them already do.
Like..? Please don't cite Lux's laser or Xerath's Q, those aren't projectiles.
It's not an invisible projectile. The projectile is just really, really fast.
Fyi it blocks heal from vlad q aswell
It's a projectile unfortunately. Go to practice mpde and you can see it.
